data:
{"name":"Helge Sverre","domain":"helgesver.re","claimed":false,"description":"I'm Helge Sverre, a developer in Bergen, Norway, Currently CTO at Tjommi, where I tirelessly try to make computers understand what a receipt looks like, and how to extract prices from websites.","longDescription":"Helge Sverre is an expert developer based in Bergen, Norway. With over 10+ years of experience, he is highly skilled in Laravel, React, VueJS, and Flutter. Helge is known for his all-stack development expertise and has a passion for building web applications using Laravel and the TALL-stack.

Currently, Helge is focused on developing Mindwave, a Laravel package that simplifies AI integration into Laravel applications. This package includes features like chatbots, vector database, semantic retrieval, and AI agents, making AI integration seamless.

In his role as the VP of Engineering at Crescat AS, Helge is building collaborative software for venues, festivals, and event professionals. This software streamlines event management with features such as day sheets, checklists, reporting, and crew member booking.

Previously, as the Chief Technology Officer at Tjommi, Helge was responsible for developing an Ecommerce price monitoring and email automation backend. He also utilized OpenAI for email receipt parsing and built web scrapers for various stores.

As a co-founder of Coded AS, Helge is involved in building B2B Saas applications. Their current projects include BoatFlow and Reflow. BoatFlow provides comprehensive solutions for boat service companies, while Reflow simplifies work orders and CRM for blue-collar businesses.

Helge's previous experience includes working as a partner and lead developer at Guilty AS, where he mentored the development team and built web applications and mobile apps using Flutter, Laravel, VueJS, and Craft CMS. He also worked as a system developer at ABAX, where he developed multi-tenant SaaS software using C# and .NET.

You can follow Helge on Twitter, GitHub, and LinkedIn for the latest updates on his projects and expertise.","links":[{"name":"twitter","url":"https://twitter.com/helgesverre"},{"name":"github","url":"https://github.com/helgesverre"}],"logos":[{"theme":"dark","formats":[{"src":"https://asset.brandfetch.io/idoZW3hPKV/id5xtL0szA.jpeg","background":null,"format":"jpeg","height":400,"width":400,"size":20566}],"tags":["photographic","portrait"],"type":"icon"}],"colors":[{"hex":"#fedf46","type":"accent","brightness":219},{"hex":"#017757","type":"dark","brightness":92},{"hex":"#ffffff","type":"light","brightness":255}],"fonts":[{"name":"ui-sans-serif","type":"body","origin":"custom","originId":null,"weights":[]}],"images":[{"formats":[{"src":"https://asset.brandfetch.io/idoZW3hPKV/ideGvkKD7O.jpeg","background":null,"format":"jpeg","height":500,"width":1500,"size":30818}],"tags":[],"type":"banner"}]}
